name: Microbiota Panic
description:
Microbiota Panic - A Ludum Dare 42 Running out of Space theme game, project of Cyberjack Studios.

Survive the gut and try not to panic.

Credits:

Programming - Dicken (Movixio) David
Programming - Ebrahem Som
